titles.title: To provide for continued retirement and leave benefits for certain former employees of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 8/4/1995--Introduced. Provides for continued retirement benefits under the Civil Service and Federal Employees' Retirement Systems, as well as annual and sick leave credits, for certain former employees of the Department of Defense (DOD) who transferred to a contractor concurrently with the transfer of any functions from a DOD component to such contractor.
